subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: LEMONT, Ill., Sept. 4 (AP) — Phil Mickelson withdrew Tuesday from the BMW Championship, one day after threatening not to play because of a conflict he had with Tim Finchem, the PGA Tour commissioner, over issues he would not explain.
snippet: LEMONT, Ill., Sept. 4 (AP) — Phil Mickelson withdrew Tuesday from the BMW Championship, one day after threatening not to play because of a conflict he had with Tim Finchem, the PGA Tour commissioner, over issues he would not explain.
